With a roll of 10 on your D20, Lirael takes aim at Cultist 2 (the wounded spellcaster) to prevent them from completing the dark ritual. The arrow strikes the spellcaster, causing an additional 4 points of damage. The spellcaster looks severely injured but is still standing, clutching their wound and struggling to maintain concentration on the ritual.

Current combat situation:

* Cultist 1 (disrupted spellcaster): Defeated
* Cultist 2 (spellcaster): Severely wounded
* Cultist 3 (melee): Engaged with Dragonborn warriors, severely wounded and restrained
* Cultist 4 (melee): Engaged with Dragonborn warriors, severely wounded
* Cultist 5 (melee): Defeated

Allies:

* Lirael: Unharmed
* Dragonborn warriors: Slightly wounded
* Esterosian mage: Unharmed
* Esterosian fighters: Slightly wounded

What will you do next, Lirael?

A. Attempt to finish off the severely wounded spellcaster with another arrow. (Roll a D20 for the attack and a D8 for damage, if successful.)
